scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web -c green,blue "npm --workspace server run dev" "npm --workspace web run dev"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm --workspace server run start
scripts.build: npm --workspace server run build && npm --workspace web run build
scripts.typecheck: npm --workspace server run typecheck && npm --workspace web run typecheck
scripts.lint: npm --workspace server run lint && npm --workspace web run lint
scripts.test: npm --workspace server run test && npm --workspace web run test
scripts.test:coverage: npm --workspace server run test:coverage && npm --workspace web run test:coverage
